info.description: This is the public Twilio REST API.
info.title: Twilio REST API

parameters.description: A human readable descriptive text for this resource, up to 64 characters.
parameters.name: FriendlyName

parameters.description: A webhook request is made to the Inbound Request URL when a message is received by any phone number or shortcode associated to your Messaging Service.
parameters.name: InboundRequestUrl

parameters.description: The HTTP method used when making requests to the Inbound Request URL.
parameters.name: InboundMethod

parameters.description: A request is made to the Fallback URL if an error occurs with retrieving or executing the TwiML from you Inbound Request URL.
parameters.name: FallbackUrl

parameters.description: The HTTP method used when requesting the Fallback URL.
parameters.name: FallbackMethod

parameters.description: A webhook request is made to the Status Callback to pass status updates about your messages.
parameters.name: StatusCallback

parameters.description: Configuration to enable or disable Sticky Sender on your Service Instance.
parameters.name: StickySender

parameters.description: Configuration to enable or disable MMS Converter on your Service Instance.
parameters.name: MmsConverter

parameters.description: Configuration to enable or disable Smart Encoding.
parameters.name: SmartEncoding

parameters.description: Configuration to enable or disable Fallback to Long Code.
parameters.name: FallbackToLongCode

parameters.description: Configuration to enable or disable Area Code Geomatch.
parameters.name: AreaCodeGeomatch

parameters.description: Configuration to set the validity period of all messages sent from your Service, in seconds.
parameters.name: ValidityPeriod

parameters.description: The 34 character unique sid of the Service.
parameters.name: MessagingServiceSid

parameters.name: To

parameters.name: Body

parameters.description: The list of urls.
parameters.name: MediaUrl
